sentence.text: To personalize nutrition, the purpose of this study was to examine five key genes in the folate metabolism pathway, and dietary parameters and related inttranscription by RNA polymerase IIctive parameters as predictors of colorectal cancer (CRC) by measuring the healthy eating index (HEI) in multiethnic families.

Additional predictors included age, as well as gender and the interaction of MTHFR 677 with overweight status (measured by body cell adhesion mediated by integrin index) in predicting CRC, with the cancer group having more negative regulation of phosphatase activity and overweight cases.
